Question
========

Two events A and B are independent if holds:

Answerlist
----------

* P(A ∩ B) = 0
* P(A ∩ B) = P(A) x P(B)
* P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B)
* P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A ∩ B)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P(A ∩ B) = 0: Incorrect
* P(A ∩ B) = P(A) x P(B): Correct
* P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B): Incorrect
* P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A ∩ B): Incorrect
